name: Secession Crisis
description: A settlement declares independence from your kingdom

skillOptions.failureEffect: Settlement in revolt - loses one level (minimum 1), highest tier structure in that settlement is destroyed, lose 2d4 Gold
skillOptions.criticalFailureExtra: Settlement declares independence with all adjacent hexes (becomes free city-state), +2 Unrest, any armies located in the hexes defect
